meanings.definition: A flat or rounded flower cluster in which the individual flower stalks arise from the same point.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful umbels swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Bees buzzed happily around the umbels, collecting nectar from each tiny flower.
meanings.sent3: The umbels in the vase on the table seemed to be chatting with each other about the sunny weather.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like the cheerful umbels in a field.
meanings.sent5: The umbels in the meadow looked like a vibrant floral umbrella shielding the insects from the sun.

meanings.definition: A type of inflorescence in which the flowers are borne on short stalks and spread from a common point.
meanings.sent1: The farmer admired the umbels of the carrot plants growing in neat rows.
meanings.sent2: The parsley plant had delicate umbels that added a touch of elegance to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The umbels at the market seemed to be dancing in the sunlight, enticing customers to buy them.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas bloomed like the intricate umbels of a flower, each one connected to the central theme.
meanings.sent5: The umbels of the dill plant released a fragrant aroma that filled the kitchen with a fresh scent.
